name: Cyber Train of Death
description:
Game not finished

Fight the robots until you die. But everytime you die you loose a level and you may get some upgrades, but the enemies will also get stronger for each upgrade. The game ends when you get to level zero.

This game was submited for the Godot Wild Jam #45 with the theme Underground. Unfortunately we were not able to do a playable game, but we plan completing it until the end of the month

Art: Marcelo Rossato @Ravensherald
Coding: Ludovico Rak, LudowS, Jaleen, JukingJukes

Text Font: Revolvingdor Font
